doc.title: '...nettirwnU'
doc.plot: Andrew Herberts is a unpublished author nearing the end of his days. Determined to finish his great novel before he dies, he's locked himself in his apartment, where he works night and day. He has gotten within the last chapter when a mysterious reporter unexpectedly shows up at the door to interview him about his life.

Andrew Herberts is a unpublished author nearing the end of his days. Determined to finish his great novel before he dies, he's locked himself in his apartment, where he works night and day. He has gotten within the last chapter when a mysterious reporter unexpectedly shows up at the door to interview him about his life.
